#summary Help Menu

=Help Menu=

The following commands are available from the Help menu:

  * *Show Helpfiles* opens this helpfile
  * *Tcl Code Console* launches a console where Tcl code can be entered directly. Not available on Linux.
  * [DebuggingLog Debugging Log Window]
  * *About Potato* opens a window with some basic info about Potato, and also allows you to view certain information about the current install useful for debugging.
  * [http://code.google.com/p/potatomushclient/ Visit Potato Website]
